Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.newdawn.slick.util.pathfinding.Mover

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.newdawn.slick.util.pathfinding.Mover
    Represents the main player of the game. It handles movement and rendering.

    • Field Summary

      Speed of player in pixels per millisecond.

      • update

        public boolean update(World world,
                      float xDir,
                      float yDir,
                      int delta)
               throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Moves player if path is not blocked.
        Parameters:
        world - It represents the entire game where the player exists.
        xDir - The 's movement in the x axis (-1, 0 or 1).
        yDir - The 's movement in the y axis (-1, 0 or 1).
        delta - Time passed since last frame (milliseconds).
        Returns:
        True if player has moved.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
